Text.Page:
Free. Thank Kaia, I'm free!

Ughâ€”I think you've done me in, .

I'm dying...

No, no...it's better this way. I couldn't live with the shame of my actions.

Suryati leads the argons. I'll have to leave him to you. Heh. Tell him I said hello.

Wait here while I open the portal. Careful! It'll take time...and they'll know you're coming."It was the only way.""Good."
